vsParam:
Lord Scalcap~
We've finished the commission you asked us to do~

Oh yeah? Thank you.
Haha, in this way, my members could idle around freely!

Idle around... Scalcap, speaking of which, what does...
"the Dardala Company" really mean?

Oh? Just literally? Namely, "a company
where people idle around together".

Haha, don't mind that!
Just pretty much the gist.

We should idle around through our life! So, I want to
promote this idea around the whole Bressisle Island!

To show people how great it is "to idle around"!
And we "Dardala Company" is trying to achieve that purpose.

Oh, I see...
But now, it's just an average group of bandits...

Oh, that's really mean!
But I won't hold a grudge against a young lady like you!

We'll see. I'll lead the whole "Dardala Company" to
conquer Bressisle someday with proper idleness.

Um... What do we do?
Should we try our best to stop him?

Hahaha, it doesn't matter...
They just idle around, not creating any trouble...
Maybe I should join the "Dardala Company"...

Haha, it's a possibility!
But this is also a lifestyle.

Oh, really?
I'm popular, aren't I?

No, [px], you can't join them!
[px], you can't idle around. You need to study hard!

Haha!
They don't allow you to join us, [px]!

... Never mind.
I'll ask you for help if I need something else.

It's to maintain our idle life!
Hahaha!
